sentences.en: a house surrounded by tall trees
A tall, soft-spoken woman, she is idolized by her young patients.
sentences.cn: 她个子高挑，说话轻声细语，深受年轻患者的喜爱。

sentences.en: All the Trollope boys were heavily built and quite tall.
sentences.cn: 特罗洛普家的所有男孩都是体格强壮、身材高大。

sentences.en: At this rate, she would be almost seven feet tall by then.
sentences.cn: 这样下去，她到时将有7英尺高了。

sentences.en: Carol is a tall, dark, Latin type of woman.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔身材高大，黑发棕肤，是个有着拉丁风情的女子。

sentences.en: He was a tall, lanky man with iron-grey hair.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个子，一头铁灰色头发。

sentences.en: He was a tall, thin fellow with a slight stoop.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个儿，有点驼背。

sentences.en: He was a tall, thin man with grey hair.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个，头发灰白。

sentences.en: He was almost as tall as Pete, but skinnier.
sentences.cn: 他和皮特差不多高，但更瘦。

sentences.en: I struggled, but he was a tall man, well-built.
sentences.cn: 我使劲挣扎，但他又高又壮。

sentences.en: I'm only 5ft tall, and I look younger than my age.
sentences.cn: 我才5英尺高，显得比实际年龄小。

sentences.en: Lovett was a tall, commanding man with a waxed gray mustache.
sentences.cn: 洛维特是个威严的高个男人，蓄着灰白的八字胡。

sentences.en: She is tall and blonde, with a permanent tan.
sentences.cn: 她高个儿，一头金发，皮肤黝黑。

sentences.en: She stood five feet five inches tall and weighed 120 pounds.
sentences.cn: 她身高5英尺5英寸，体重120磅。

sentences.en: The windows overlooked a lawn of tall waving grass.
sentences.cn: 窗户外边是一块草地，高高的草随风摇摆。

sentences.en: There were lilies every-where in tall white porcelain vases.
sentences.cn: 高高的白色瓷瓶上绘满了百合花。

sentences.en: This bush grows tall very quickly.
sentences.cn: 这种灌木很快就能长高。

phrases.tran_cn: 离谱的要求；难以完成的任务
n. 吹牛，说大话；夸张的故事，荒诞的故事
理直气壮，挺直腰杆；不低三下四

trans.tran_cn: 身材高的，高大的，（数量）大的，（俚）过分的，夸张的
trans.tran_en: a person, building, tree etc that is tall is a greater height than normal

trans.tran_cn: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

trans.tran_en: a person, building, tree etc that is tall is a greater height than normal
